item.title: About me
item.description:
I usually go by the name Plum here.. I’m a Linux dabbler of several years and own several servers as projects/pets. I’m learning a bit more about Hugo static site development and github pages so this is all a bit scrappy as I learn and make notes.

My main music blog is here
